alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Missouri Headwaters (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 4:20PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, Broadwater, central Meagher, northeastern Jefferson and northwestern Gallatin Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 419 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles northwest of White Sulphur Springs to 12 miles northwest of Townsend to 13 miles east of Boulder to 12 miles northeast of Whitehall. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and a brief burst of snow or graupel. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Townsend, Toston, Fort Logan On The Smith River, Newlan Creek Reservoir, Winston, Radersburg, Silos, Fort Logan, Elkhorn State Park and Goose Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
